channel.title: Delta - X log fix?
channel.description:
Well i searched, and couldn't find anything.
Is there anyway to fix x logging?
Im not sure how i want to approach this.
I already tried making it so when you dc, your account stays logged in for 10 seconds. the only problem was that when you wanted to logout normally, you stayed logged in.
